investments.description: Manage and track your investment portfolio in one place.
investments.userProfileError: User profile is not available. Please log in to view your investments.
investments.portfolioDescription: Manage your investments and track their performance.
investments.startBuilding: Start building your portfolio by adding your first investment.

dashboard.recommendedAllocation: Recommended allocation based on your risk profile

savingsInsight.low: Hi {name}, we noticed your monthly savings are below the recommended amount. Consider creating a budget to increase your savings rate.
savingsInsight.moderate: Good job {name}! You're making progress toward your savings goals, but there's still room for improvement.
savingsInsight.high: Excellent work {name}! You're exceeding your savings targets. Consider investing the extra funds to maximize your returns.

expenseInsight.high: {name}, your expenses are high relative to your income. Consider identifying areas where you can cut back.
expenseInsight.moderate: {name}, your expenses are at a moderate level. Look for opportunities to reduce non-essential spending.
expenseInsight.low: {name}, you're doing well at keeping your expenses in check. This gives you more flexibility for savings and investments.

investmentAdvice.conservative: As a conservative investor {name}, focus on stable investments like bonds and dividend stocks to preserve capital.
investmentAdvice.moderate: With your moderate risk tolerance {name}, a balanced portfolio of stocks and bonds could work well for you.
investmentAdvice.aggressive: As an aggressive investor {name}, you might consider growth stocks and alternative investments for higher potential returns.
